actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Energy to request the National Academy of Sciences to conduct a study of the sources of, the damage caused by, and the possible means of preventing occurrences of the phenomenon of electrical and electromagnetic leakage known as stray voltage.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Energy to require the National Academy of Sciences to report to the Congress the results of a study regarding electrical and electromagnetic leakage known as stray voltage. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Energy to request the National Academy of Sciences to conduct a study of the sources of, the damage caused by, and the possible means of preventing occurrences of the phenomenon of electrical and electromagnetic leakage known as stray voltage.
